scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug    --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate --optimize --runtime full --importMemory --sharedMemory 65536 --enable bulk-memory,threads,sign-extension,simd
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
